E

EditEventActivity - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
EditEventActivity This activity provides options related to event editing, sending notifications to entrants, and viewing the list of entrants Contains a NavHostFragment to display fragments related to this activity and a sets up a BottomNavigationView to quickly swap between EventDetailScreenFragment, EntrantListSelectionFragment, and OrganiserNotificationsUIFragment Retrieves the eventId from the intent and puts it in a bundle to be used by related fragments
EditEventActivity() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EditEventActivity
 
EntrantList - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
An instance of this class represents the waiting lists for a single event
EntrantList() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EntrantList
The general constructor for this class does not require any arguments, all attributes are initialized to be empty ArrayLists, where the waiting list represents people who have signed up in the waiting list but haven't been selected yet, chosen represents people who have been selected by the lottery system but haven't accepted or declined yet, cancelled are the people who declined their invitation to participate, and finalized are the people who have accepted their invitation to participate
EntrantListSelectionFragment - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
EntrantListSelectionFragment Displays the categories of entrants and allows the user to navigate to the respective fragment for viewing the chosen list of entrants User can choose to see all entrants, chosen entrants, pending entrants, cancelled entrants, and finalised list of entrants, with buttons linking to AllEntrantsListFragment, ChosenEntrantListFragment, PendingEntrantListFragment, CancelledEntrantListFragment, and FinalEntrantList
EntrantListSelectionFragment() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EntrantListSelectionFragment
 
equals(Object) - Method in class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.User
Check if a user object is equivalent to another user object
Event - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
An instance of this object represents a single instance of an event
Event() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Event
An empty constructor for the Event class, is used because it makes it easier to parse a document from Firebase and set specific fields to the values extracted from Firebase
Event(String, String, String, String[], String, String, String, String, String, String, int, int) - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Event
This constructor can also allow for the instantiation of the event object from the program, but the main purpose here is to help with testing
Event(String, String, String, String[], String, String, String, String, String, String, int, int, boolean) - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Event
This constructor can also allow for the instantiation of the event object from the program, but the main purpose here is to help with mock testing
Event(String, String, String, ArrayList<String>, String, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, LocalDateTime, int, int) - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Event
A constructor whose main purpose is to allow for the instantiation of the event object from the program itself
EventDetailScreenFragment - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
EventDetailScreenFragment This fragment displays the details for a selected event Gets the eventId from arguments and fetches the event from the database Displays fetched data including the name, description, tags, and an uploaded image Gets the current activity, if it is ContentActivity then treats the user like an entrant and allows the user to join the waitlist for the event If the current activity is EditEventActivity then treats the user like the organiser and displays options for editing the event Currently does not display options for editing the event
EventDetailScreenFragment() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EventDetailScreenFragment
 
EventsUIFragment - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
Displays a listview of all available events that the user can join, as well as an option to go to MyEventsFragment to view the user's created events and to create a new event in CreateOrEditEventFragment Fetches an array of events from the database then displays them textually in a listview Allows the user to click on any event in the list to open up a detailed view of the event in EventDetailScreenFragment
EventsUIFragment() - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EventsUIFragment
 
EventTagsAdapter - Class in com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication
EventTagsAdapter is used by EventDetailScreenFragment to fetch strings to display in the HorizontalRVActivity
EventTagsAdapter(List<String>) - Constructor for class com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.EventTagsAdapter
